mapper.sql: user_serial, user_no, user_lname, user_fname, dep_no, user_dep, user_depname, user_workday, user_duty, user_card, user_finger, user_password, pwd_begin, pwd_end, user_type, pact_begin, pact_end, user_level, user_photo, user_sex, user_nation, user_xueli, user_native, user_birthday, user_id, user_post, user_linkman, user_telephone, user_address, user_email, user_1, user_2, user_bz, kq_rule, kq_taoban, kq_tiaoxiu, xf_time, xf_jiange, xf_je, user_sj, user_rank, gly_img, user_ac, user_gsbh, user_yglx, user_zhbh, user_zhlx, user_txm, user_lx, user_mj, user_identity, user_face, lx, spare_col1, spare_col2
mapper.select: select * from dt_user where (user_no = #{userNo} or user_telephone = #{userNo}) and user_type <51
select b.user_serial, b.user_lname, b.user_no, b.lx, a.openid, a.unionid from wx_login_openid a inner join dt_user b on a.user_serial = b.user_serial where b.user_type < 51 and a.UNIONID = #{unionId}

select a.user_lname, a.user_serial, a.user_no, a.user_depname, a.user_card, convert(varchar, b.ac_money / 100) as ac_money, case isnull(a.user_card, '0') when '0' then 0 when '' then 0 else 1 end as user_lx from dt_user a inner join dt_ac_link b on a.user_serial = b.user_serial where a.user_serial = #{userSerial} and user_type <51
mapper.insert: insert into wt_public (lx, log_type, is_all, user_serial, card_serial, new_number, old_number, log_sj, log_ip, gly_no) select 8, 6, 0, #{userSerial}, card_serial, '', '', #{userSj}, '', #{userSerial} from dt_card where user_serial = #{userSerial} and card_hao = #{userCard}
mapper.select: select a.user_serial, a.user_card from dt_user a inner join dt_card b on a.user_serial = b.user_serial and b.card_type = 0 where (a.user_card <> '' and a.user_card is not null) and a.user_type < 51 and a.user_serial = #{userSerial}
